Those movies sound interesting! I like romantic dramas. "Our Times" and "You Are the Apple of My Eye" seem familiar. What are they about?
system

"Our Times" is a Taiwanese romantic comedy-drama that follows the story of a high school girl named Lin Cheng-Wei, who has a crush on the popular boy in school. However, her life takes a turn when she gets involved with a delinquent named Ouyang Fei-Fan. The film explores themes of first love, friendship, and the bittersweet nature of growing up.

"You Are the Apple of My Eye" is a coming-of-age romantic drama that tells the story of a group of high school friends, focusing on the relationship between the shy and awkward boy, Ko Ching-Teng, and the beautiful and popular girl, Shen Chia-Yi. The film captures the essence of young love, nostalgia, and the challenges of adolescence.

Both films beautifully depict the complexities of love and relationships during the formative years. If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask!
